response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds $10,000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To start our conversation, I am extending an initial offer of $15,000 for the product. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests or if you would like to discuss further details. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 15000}
